This COOFANDY short sleeve button-down is the ultimate summer sidekick. Whether you’re hitting the beach, a wedding, or just lounging around, this shirt has you covered—literally! It’s breezy, lightweight, and looks like it was made for sipping cocktails by the ocean. The pocket is perfect for stashing your shades or a secret snack, and the fit is spot-on—relaxed enough to keep you cool, but sharp enough to make you look like you actually tried. If you want a shirt that says ‘I’m here for a good time and I look good doing it,’ this is the one. Trust me, this shirt is about to become your summer MVP!
